title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 341.9 - Podiatrist fees for hearing purposes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 341.9 - Podiatrist fees for hearing purposes

State Regulations
A podiatrist who testifies at hearings or examines
claimants or participates in examination for evidential material for
compensation case hearing purposes only, without treatment, may accept fees for
such services from the claimant, employer or carrier requesting the
examination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
341.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
